components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: Customers Unable to Download Documents in Alphanumeric Sender ID Form on Help Pages

incident_updates.body: Customers are unable to download any documents related to Alphanumeric Sender ID Form from the help pages. We expect to provide another update in 4 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
We've become aware of a potential issue with Twilio Console. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our SMS carrier partner in the US and Puerto Rico is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 03 March 2024 at 21:00 PST until 05 March 2024 at 21:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from US and Puerto Rico handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

03 March 2024 at 21:00 PST until 04 March 2024 at 05:00 PST
04 March 2024 at 21:00 PST until 05 March 2024 at 05:00 PST
05 March 2024 at 15:00 PST until 05 March 2024 at 21:00 PST
